testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlArchivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.6.1.2 [Need for Original Source Data for Traffic Monitoring Measurements] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send Traffic Monitoring Data Inventory Information Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.6.1.1.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N106R1160_Send_Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N106R1160_Send_Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Traffic Monitoring Data is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.3.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R1170_Restrictions___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported = ${TMDD_N106R1170_Restrictions___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Purpose of the Data Set is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.3.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R1171_Purpose_of_the_Data_Set_Supported = ${TMDD_N106R1171_Purpose_of_the_Data_Set_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Title of the Data Set is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.3.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R1172_Title_of_the_Data_Set_Supported = ${TMDD_N106R1172_Title_of_the_Data_Set_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Version of the Data Set is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.3.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R1173_Version_of_the_Data_Set_Supported = ${TMDD_N106R1173_Version_of_the_Data_Set_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Publication Information of the Data Set is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.3.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R1174_Publication_Information_of_the_Data_Set_Supported = ${TMDD_N106R1174_Publication_Information_of_the_Data_Set_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Progress of the Data Set is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.3.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R1175_Progress_of_the_Data_Set_Supported = ${TMDD_N106R1175_Progress_of_the_Data_Set_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Maintenance of the Data Set is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.3.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R1176_Maintenance_of_the_Data_Set_Supported = ${TMDD_N106R1176_Maintenance_of_the_Data_Set_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Data Set Uniform Resource Locator (URL) (DataURL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.3.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R1177_Data_Set_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DataURL__Supported = ${TMDD_N106R1177_Data_Set_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DataURL__Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Data Set URL Reference Medium is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.3.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R1178_Data_Set_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported = ${TMDD_N106R1178_Data_Set_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier - Traffic Monitoring Data is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.3.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R1179_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported = ${TMDD_N106R1179_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier - Traffic Monitoring Data is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.3.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R1180_Link_Identifier___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported = ${TMDD_N106R1180_Link_Identifier___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator - Traffic Monitoring Data is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.3.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R1181_Route_Designator___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported = ${TMDD_N106R1181_Route_Designator___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference - Traffic Monitoring Data is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.3.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R1182_Linear_Reference___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported = ${TMDD_N106R1182_Linear_Reference___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N106R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N106R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 17 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 19 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 20 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlArchivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N106R1160_Send_Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected

Step 21 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 21.1 VERIFY that an archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg message was received.
Step 21.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.3 VERIFY that a data-set-type data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.4 VERIFY that a data-set-description data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.5 VERIFY that a data-collection-time-period-start data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.6 VERIFY that a data-collection-time-period-end data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.7 VERIFY that a data-set-publication-date-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.8 IF TMDD_N106R1170_Restrictions___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 21.8.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.9 IF TMDD_N106R1171_Purpose_of_the_Data_Set_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 21.9.1 VERIFY that a data-set-purpose data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.10 IF TMDD_N106R1172_Title_of_the_Data_Set_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 21.10.1 VERIFY that a data-set-title data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.11 IF TMDD_N106R1173_Version_of_the_Data_Set_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 21.11.1 VERIFY that a data-set-version data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.12 IF TMDD_N106R1174_Publication_Information_of_the_Data_Set_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 21.12.1 VERIFY that a data-set-publication-information data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.13 IF TMDD_N106R1175_Progress_of_the_Data_Set_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 21.13.1 VERIFY that a data-set-progress-status data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.14 IF TMDD_N106R1176_Maintenance_of_the_Data_Set_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 21.14.1 VERIFY that a data-set-maintenance-frequency data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.15 IF TMDD_N106R1177_Data_Set_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DataURL__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 21.15.1 VERIFY that a data-set-url data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.16 IF TMDD_N106R1178_Data_Set_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 21.16.1 VERIFY that an url-reference-medium data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item.data-set-url
Step 21.17 IF TMDD_N106R1179_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 21.17.1 VERIFY that a data-set-roadway-network-id-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.18 IF TMDD_N106R1180_Link_Identifier___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 21.18.1 VERIFY that a data-set-link-id-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.19 IF TMDD_N106R1181_Route_Designator___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 21.19.1 VERIFY that a data-set-route-designator-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.20 IF TMDD_N106R1182_Linear_Reference___Traffic_Monitoring_Data_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 21.20.1 VERIFY that a data-set-linear-reference-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item

Step 21.20.2 VERIFY that a data-set-linear-reference-version data element exists within each instance of data frame archivedDataTrafficMonitoringMetadataMsg.archived-data-traffic-monitoring-metadata-item
Step 21.21 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 22 IF ErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 22.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 22.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 22.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 22.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 22.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 22.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to ErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 22.7 IF TMDD_N106R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 22.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 23 EXIT
